p: To study the arboviral epidemiology in Peru is essential to understand their real impact in our community. This study aimed to detect, through RT-PCR, the presence of DENV, CHIKV, ZIKV, MAYV, and OROV in samples of patients with Acute Febrile Illness (AFI) from Puerto Maldonado (Peru) and to assess preliminary epidemiological and clinical data of these patients.
